entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:39 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 5 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
